title: Hour 3 - Bronny's Name Value, Dave Roberts
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Bronny's Name Value, Dave Roberts
description:
Dan and the Danettes talk about the advantages and disadvantages for the offspring of superstar athletes. And Los Angeles Dodgers Manager Dave Roberts stops by and reiterates that nobody in their locker room had any issue with Freddie Freeman's emotional reaction during his return to Atlanta.

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
